channel.title: How to set you variables and complier for windows!
channel.description:
this is still a big thing on server help so ill make a tutorial
today i will be teaching you to set your enviromental variables and complier first of all we will get your variables set
go to your computer and click view information settings which is highlighted in red [IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial.jpg[/img]
next you will click advanced and click on enviromental variables advanced is highlighted black and enviromental variables is red
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial3.jpg[/img]
ok now find path then click edit you will be brought to a small box
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial4.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial5.jpg[/img] for the variable value in the small box put this in
C:\Windows\System32\;C:\Windows\;C:\Windows\System32\Wbem/
then your set for the variables now for the complier part.
go to your c: file on my computer
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial6.jpg[/img]
now your guna look for program files in the c: file
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial7.jpg[/img]
open up program file and find the file java
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial8.jpg[/img]
then you will see jdk1.6.0_17 this doesnt mean that 6u17 has to be yours its just the java you have
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial9.jpg[/img]
now you know what java you have so go to your complier and edit it.
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial10.jpg[/img]
now change the highlighted words to your java you just have to change the 17 to your number of java like jdk1.6.0_12 etc.
[IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/zachrida/tutorial11.jpg[/img]

item.title: How to set you variables and complier for windows!
item.dc:creator: @zachrida zachrida
item.description:
@zachrida wrote:

this is still a big thing on server help so ill make a tutorial

today i will be teaching you to set your enviromental variables and complier
first of all we will get your variables set

go to your computer and click view information settings which is highlighted in red

next you will click advanced and click on enviromental variables advanced is highlighted black and enviromental variables is red

ok now find path then click edit you will be brought to a small box


for the variable value in the small box put this in

C:\Windows\System32;C:\Windows;C:\Windows\System32\Wbem/

then your set for the variables now for the complier part.

go to your c: file on my computer

now your guna look for program files in the c: file

open up program file and find the file java

then you will see jdk1.6.0_17 this doesnt mean that 6u17 has to be yours its just the java you have

now you know what java you have so go to your complier and edit it.

now change the highlighted words to your java you just have to change the 17 to your number of java like jdk1.6.0_12 etc.

Read full topic
item.source: How to set you variables and complier for windows!
